tagline: Comprehensive pet care systems so nothing falls through the cracks for the family members who can't speak up
pros: Builds comprehensive care manuals any caretaker can follow
Tracks medications and health changes systematically
Clear urgency triage — knows when to say 'vet, today'
Handles multi-pet household logistics without overwhelm
cons: Not a veterinarian — no medical diagnosis
Care systems require initial setup investment
Pet-focused — doesn't extend to livestock or farm animal management

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
